original: 「今曹操欲盜神器，宗室微弱。斟酌古式，依假權宜，上臣為漢中王，臣輒順眾議，拜受印璽。」
text: "Today Cao Cao wants to steal the artifact, the clan is weak. Considering the ancient style, according to the false expediency, the superior is the king of Hanzhong, and the minister obeys the opinions of the people and worships the seal."
